DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate the antiviral effect of GS-5806 in healthy adults infected with a strain of Respiratory Syncytial Virus.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of GS-5806 in Healthy Volunteers Infected With Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV)
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female Between 18 to 45 years old Body Mass Index of 18 to 33 kg/m2 Acute or chronic medical illness Positive for Human Immunodeficiency Virus, Hepatitis B or C Nose or nasopharynx abnormalities Abnormal lung function
